title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 446.25 - Home medical care program
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 446.25 - Home medical care program

State Regulations
(a) Each
functional cost center (6910-6990) must be reported separately. (b) Report data regardless of participation
in AHS program. (c) Service data to
be provided: (1)

Patients on Home Care first
day of reporting period. (2)

Admissions to Home Care during the reporting period. (3)

Total patients under care. (4)

Deaths on Home Care. (5)

All other discharges from Home

Care. (6)

Total discharges from

Home Care. (7)

Patients remaining
on Home Care on last day of reporting period. (8)

Total days of care provided during the
reporting period. (d) Do
not report this data, under either inpatient or outpatient services, in any
other area. (e) Exclude Home

Program dialysis. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
446.25

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
